title: Where is help for 4xl? I'm only seeing pixel 2 & 3
content: My phone is not running normal pixel software it's like everything is being casted from somewhere else. It's split into 2 and I only control half. Some stuff I'd dark and some is light themed but when it is dark it's usaally not black but rather gray. When I troubleshoot anything I don't see the right options that should pertain to my device.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
